Title: Camera.Media.Copier
Description: CameraMediaCopier is a simple WPF application that copies JPG and AVI files from a camera's memory card into a folder format of the users choice (i.e c:\My Pictures\Canon\IXUS 40\2008\Jan\MyImage.JPG). During the copy process these images are displayed. Built using VS 2008.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
CameraMediaCopier is a simple WPF application that copies JPG and AVI files from a camera's memory card into a folder format of the users choice (i.e c:\My Pictures\Canon\IXUS 40\2008\Jan\MyImage.JPG). During the copy process these images are displayed. Built using VS 2008.

Feel free to provide suggestions on how to improve this app.

One of the key things I'd like to impove is the display of AVI files, so it would be great to get some feedback on this.

Enjoy

I hope someone finds this useful
